statements: SELECT * FROM user_roles;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles;
SELECT role_name, user_id FROM user_roles;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT role_name, user_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'editor' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'admin' AND user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT DISTINCT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE user_id <> '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE id=1;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE user_id=2;
SELECT id, data FROM sensitive_data WHERE id IN (1, 3);
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE role='Admin' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE user_id=1 AND data LIKE '%password%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, role FROM users WHERE username='alice' OR username='bob' ORDER BY role;
SELECT u.username, sd.data FROM users u JOIN sensitive_data sd ON u.id = sd.user_id WHERE sd.data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY u.username, sd.id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role='Admin' AND id IN (SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM sensitive_data);
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT id, username FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, role FROM Users ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS num_employees FROM Employees GROUP BY department HAVING num_employees > 5;
SELECT id, username, role FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM Employees WHERE department LIKE 'HR%' ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT department, role FROM DepartmentRoles WHERE department = 'IT' AND role = 'engineer' ORDER BY department, role;
SELECT username, role FROM Users WHERE username = 'johndoe' OR role = 'manager' ORDER BY username;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM Employees ORDER BY department ASC, last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, role FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT order_id, user_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY order_id, user_id;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT user_id, role FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM roles ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT data_content FROM data WHERE owner_id = 5;
SELECT data.data_content, users.username FROM data JOIN users ON data.owner_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role_id = 2 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT data_id, data_content FROM data WHERE owner_id = 3 AND data_content LIKE '%important%';
SELECT u.username, d.data_content, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN data d ON u.user_id = d.owner_id JOIN roles r ON u.role_id = r.role_id;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, COUNT(v.view_id) AS view_count FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN users_views v ON u.user_id = v.user_id GROUP BY u.username, r.role_name ORDER BY view_count DESC;
